534030.name: Pirate Pop™ Soundtrack
534030.description:
Ahoy matey! This is the official, bubble-poppin', heart-stoppin', beat-droppin' soundtrack to Pirate Pop™! Join Pete Jr. as he blasts his way through 8 treasure-filled tracks by Harry Waters, Matthew Ivic & GYMS, each one sure to get you moving!

Track Listing:

Side A

1. Harry Waters - Analogue 00:18
2. Harry Waters - Ahoy 02:25
3. Matthew Ivic - Aye! 03:28
4. gyms - Anchor 02:53

Side B

5. Matthew Ivic - Barnacles 03:32
6. gyms - Blazing 03:11
7. Harry Waters - Blast 02:51
8. Harry Waters & Matthew Ivic - Begone 00:59
534030.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
